description: Offers, promotions and discounts in leading London restaurants, bars, shops, theatres, galleries and more.

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Offers, promotions and discounts in leading London restaurants, bars, shops, theatres, galleries and more."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
With a Visitor Oyster card you can enjoy fantastic offers and discounts in London. You only need to show your card to benefit from these offers:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Food and drink discounts at a range of selected London restaurants","Discounted and 2 for 1 entry at selected museums","Discounts on merchandise at some of London's top attractions including Madame Tussauds, Kew Gardens and The London Dungeon","15% discount at a world-famous chocolate shop","Up to 26% discount on the Emirates Air Line and discounts on Thames River Services sightseeing cruises"]}
Buy a Visitor Oyster card before you leave home to take advantage of these great offers and discounts. It is not possible to buy a Visitor Oyster card in London.
